title: What is the FONT for Sriracha Hot Sauce?
content:
hi everyone,

I'm looking for the hot Sauce Sriracha's Font...i have no idea what it is, does anyone know what Font is used? this is what it looks like on the bottle:  
 [http://www.howtopickleasweater.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/7192\_srira...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225000948/http:/www.howtopickleasweater.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/7192_sriracha28oz__05971.1313618126.1280.1280.jpg "http://www.howtopickleasweater.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/7192\_sriracha28oz\_\_05971.1313618126.1280.1280.jpg")

Thanx for any help,

Jonathan
author: Johny5

comments.content: [Balloon and Balloon Drop Shadow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225000948/http:/www.linotype.com/389533/EFBalloon-family.html) are two of the fonts used there; are those the ones you were hoping to ID?
